long_description: The clever design of the Burley Plus conversion kit lets you upgrade your Burley Piccolo trailer bike into a full-fledged, rideable bicycle once your child is ready to ride on their own. Lightweight steel "front" frame and fork of the Burley Plus are designed to easily integrate with the Piccolo bike trailer's "back" half with just a few quick, easy steps. Included in the Plus conversion kit is the front frame/fork, stem, hand brake levers, front and rear brakes, and a 20 in. front wheel. It is necessary to transfer the handlebar from the Piccolo trailer bike in order to make the Plus conversion functional. Please note: the Burley Piccolo trailer bike is sold separately and is required for use with the Plus conversion kit.
